name: Side Plank Crunch
instruction: Lie on your left side with your knees slightly bent, one leg on top of the other, place your left forearm on the floor and lift your body off the ground. Lift your right arm up and raise your right leg a few inches off the floor. Crunch by bringing your right knee up toward your right elbow. Extend your right leg and right arm and repeat for the duration of the set.
hints: Engage your core, and keep your head, neck and spine aligned. Breathe out as you crunch, and maintain a steady rhythm throughout the entire exercise.
